website_summaries.verdict: A good mid-level pocket hole kit with enough tools to accomplish a host of projects. The fact that it comes with a clamp makes it an even better deal.
pros: Impresses with numerous useful tools that have excellent craftsmanship plus the inclusion of a rugged C clamp
Has more screws than most other kits – 100 total
Falls on the middle of the price scale
cons: Instructions that come with it could be clearer and more detailed, but the kit is fairly easy to use without them

customer_reviews.title: Great pocket hole kit
customer_reviews.text: This has to be one of the best tool purchases I have made in years. It is excellent quality, easy to use, accurate and has everything you need to do the job. I borrowed a pocket tool from a friend that cost more than double and this one is clearly superior in every way. You cannot go wrong with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Bernie41

customer_reviews.title: Useful items
customer_reviews.text: Bought this items to help me build a little table for my son, it was actually quite useful. There are a ton of parts that came with it, witch makes me think it can do so much more than what I used it for. It allows you to drill holes at just about any angle, witch worked for me as I wanted to countersink quite a few seconds, I am going to have to experiment with all the attachments to see what this kit can really do. Overall very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michael raymond

customer_reviews.title: I have not used the Kreg system but after easily and successfully finishing a fine birch piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: I have not used the Kreg system but after easily and successfully finishing a fine birch piece of furniture, and paying much less for this tool, I couldn't be happier with my purchase. The jig has a steel sleeve that guides the drill bit perfectly, the bit itself also made well and went through the birch with ease, it left a crisp clean cut. There is a learning curve, I practiced on many pieces of solid wood and plywood in various thicknesses. The instructions are not in English but if you're a craftsman, it's pretty self-explanatory.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Moreno

customer_reviews.title: I want to make my bed frame looks good, so when my parents come here
customer_reviews.text: My parents are going to visit me in March, so I was thinking to make a bed frame for the mattress I just bought for them. I want to make my bed frame looks good, so when my parents come here, they won't complain about it. My friend told me if I use jig pocket hole kit will make my bed frame looks better, and my parents won't see the nail or screw from outside. I compared price and quality on Amazon. Drillpro product is the best much of mine require. I just finish my work today, and my bed looks wonderful. I am very happy that I have this tool. Very good price and do the job. strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Fang

customer_reviews.title: Decent but go with kreg.
customer_reviews.text: It will get the job done but I would spend the extra and go with the kreg jig. The holes are smaller that kreg brand screws so the screws tend to crack the wood if using kreg screws.
customer_reviews.author: Judd F

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Introduction to Pocket Hole Fastening
customer_reviews.text: The kit has everything you need to get started. Just remember to make some practice runs before doing one that matters. Once you get the hang of it, many joints look like pocket hole joints. The included screws are too cheap for anything that you care about. I picked up the Kreg kits for the screws. This jig and clamp works great.
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm

customer_reviews.title: Seems well made but..
customer_reviews.text: Preliminary review on this pocket jig. Pluses A. 1/3 cost of a Kreg B. Comes with a very functional Vice Grip Clamp. C. Sharp Drill Bit D. Quick change on thickness with snap in gauges. Minuses A. Instructions in Chinese and worthy only of fire starter. Thank goodness for YouTube video . B. Driver and Screws are Phillips instead of #2 Robertson. ( square ) C. Plastic hole fillers are a joke.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Great pocket hole jig set and compared to Kreg you ...
customer_reviews.text: Great pocket hole jig set and compared to Kreg you get way more accessories. I like the vacuum face plate adapter, will help to keep the work area cleaner. You also have different distance adapters, 2 packs of screws, a big clamp and pocket hole plugs in different colors. I’m happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: supp

customer_reviews.title: Caution instructions not in english
customer_reviews.text: Great device however the instructions our in Chinise so make sure you can read chinise
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Need instructions in English
customer_reviews.text: Seems like everything I need. But I need the instruction in English.
customer_reviews.author: TRP317

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: like this set a lot. Better pricing than others if you just need something simple
customer_reviews.author: Katie L.

customer_reviews.title: this jig pocket hole kit is perfect for my woodworking project
customer_reviews.text: this jig pocket hole kit is perfect for my woodworking project. come with all teh stuff i need and is very to use. lot more easy for my project n save time. high quality tool.
customer_reviews.author: ken

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with my purchase. It is every bit as good as the Kreg product.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Kahl

customer_reviews.title: Good tools!
customer_reviews.text: They are great tools Jig Pocket Hole kit system .Great quality product, best deal out there For pocket hole jigs, this is the best out there. Well engineered and solidly constructed, this is the kit to get you started. This set with the bonus clamp is the best deal out there. You could make do with your own clamp, but this one makes it quick and easy. All accessories and even the case is well designed to help you set up the depth clamp on the bit. The only minor complaint is that the case should be big enough to also hold the clamp. Overall a great tool, great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Hansen

customer_reviews.title: conquer any project!
customer_reviews.text: Upon ordering ofcourse I had my doubts but this did not disappoint.This little tool has opened up endless possibilities to me. With it the complexity and intimidation of building is gone. With a good plan and this little jig I can conquer any project! Pocket holes eliminate the intimidation of complex joinery and this jig makes gauging and drilling them a piece of cake!!
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: price can't be beat for what you get
customer_reviews.text: Great set for the price. This jig should be able to handle just about all angles I need to construct a cabinet
customer_reviews.author: Fixer2000

product_meta.title: DRILLPRO Jig Pocket Hole Kit System Pocket Hole Drill with Free Classic Clamp, Pocket Hole Screws and Plugs for Woodworking to Realize The Pocket Hole Connection of Various Woodworking Furniture
product_meta.description:
TO DO A GOOD JOB MUST FIRST SHARPEN HIS DEVICE, give you an unprecedented experience.

Pocket Hole Jig, an amazing repair jig, a new three-in-one product that replaces the woodwork sheet materials,
It's portable, easy to operate, firm, elegant in appearance,high-quality, accurate in locating, etc. 

Application: It is applicable to various woodworking production and connection. Splicing of drawers by DIY,wooden beds,cupboard, wardrobe, desk etc

Drillpro Package Content
1 x Main Body
5 x limited blocks
3 x covering plates
1 x elbow for dust absorption
1 x second-order drill bit
1 x spacing ring
1 x Hex Key
2 x screwdriver set heads 
1 x classic clamp
25 x plugs for pocket hole
100 x pocket hole screw

How to use Drillpro Pocket Hole Jig System ?
●Selection of limited block: selected according to the thickness of mould.
●Limit of drilling bit: Drill bit should be close to limited block and 0.5 mm spacing should be left.Fasten the spacing ring by Hex key.
●Connection with dust collector: Remove the covering plate of main part and replace it.
●Fixture application: Align the pocket hole with the wood and clamp it with the C Clamp.
●Hole boring: Rotation rate of drill is better between 500 to 1500.
●Connection with wood slab: Connect it with screws and cover the plug.

Why Choose DRILLPRO?
▶Good quality and reliable brand.
▶Within 90 days product quality is not completely satisfied, please CONTACT US, 100% refund.
feature_bullets: ❶COMPLETE ACCESSORIES and HIGH QUALTY in CHEAPER PRICES.one woodworking pocket hole kit is equipped with 10 accessories.
❷OPENING ACCURATE, OPERATION and INSTALL EASY, special tools for woodworking , improve the time and cost.
❸Main Body is made of BASF PA6/GF-30, more DURABLR, pressure resistant, drilling, precision, perforation not collapse edge, easy to drain.

❹modular slider is equipped with GR12 mold STEEL of HIGH HARDNESS and WEAR-RESISTANCE. With vacuum heat treatment, the pocket hole drill bit is made of HIGH-QUALITY, SHARP, DURABLE and LONG-LIFESPAN steel materials.
❺The Classic Clamp is equipped with special PVC RUBBER SLEEVES to prevent slipping, stabilize locating, and improve efficiency and hole boring accuracy.
